subject: Haptic controller box help
description_text:
Hi I am a little confused on which controller box I need to purchase for
the 3 pack vam pro haptics. I'm purchasing from amazon and didn't see much
detail online.

https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0FPWYHLZH/ref=sw_img_1?th=1
^ this is the 3 pack I wanted to purchase.

I was just unsure if I need the Plus X or Pro X controller box.

Also I am not using Simsonn pedals. This is for a later upgrade. I
currently am using fanatec pedals and can 3d print an adapter if I need to
but have found a lot of brackets on Etsy to be able to attach these
haptics. I would like to confirm that it will still work with my pedals as
the haptics I assume would plug right into the PC?

Please advise, thank you very much!

conversations.body_text: Hi Milan Patel,  You can choose the PlusX control box.Â
